model_outputs.question:
Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Her wheel wobbling several millimeters in either direction wasn't enough to suggest that the bike was unsafe
(B) Her wheel wobbling several feet in either direction wasn't enough to suggest that the bike was unsafe
model_outputs.model_answer: The statement that is sarcastic is (A) Her wheel wobbling several millimeters in either direction wasn't enough to suggest that the bike was unsafe. The use of the word "enough" suggests that the speaker finds the idea that the wobbling was not significant to be absurd or ironic. The fact that the wobbling was only a few millimeters suggests that it was a very small amount and not enough to cause any real concern. Therefore, the statement is sarcastic because it implies that the speaker finds the idea that the wobbling was not significant to be ridiculous.
